n early 
pregnancy can seriously 
damage your unborn baby, 
your screening test will check 
if you have immunity to rubella 
or not. If your result shows 
that, you are susceptible to 
rubella (rubella non-immune) 
you should avoid contact with 
people who have a rash or have 
been diagnosed with rubella. 
After	delivery	you	will	be	offered	
the measles, mumps, rubella 
(MMR) immunisation so that you 
will be protected against rubella 
in future pregnancies. If you can 
provide evidence from you
